basics.name: Leon Qu
basics.label: Graduate from UH Manoa in Computer Science B.S. and Chinese B.A
basics.summary: Recent graduate of B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. My interests include web design, data analytics, software engineering, and HCI.

work.summary: Worked as an education consultant in China as part of Chinese Flagship
highlights: Strategized with student clients on college planning and guided them through the application process
Produced new educational videos increasing company social media following
Wrote company website page using HTML/CSS/Javascript
Translated documents to be sent to U.S. universities

work.summary: Worked on research of California Coastlines project lead by Dr. John Lynham
highlights: Analyzed coastlines utilizing Google Earth and California Coastlines database finding trends in coastline recession
Approximated recorded points and reported back trends weekly

work.summary: Internship working on managing multiple company databases using database software
highlights: Minimized duplicates and missing information in company contact database
Introduced new client press releases through company social media channels
Implemented a more efficient process of inputting contacts into database
Maintain conference operations such as booth set up and attendee sign in
Volunteer member, YMCA Atherton, UH Manao, 2016-2018
